text: O lyudi! Vot vam pritcha, - Prislushaytes' zhe k ney! Te (bozhestva), kogo oni, oprich' Allakha, prizyvayut, Ne smogut nikogda i mukhi sotvorit', Yesli by dazhe sobralis' vse vmeste. A yesli mukha chto-nibud' u nikh pokhitit, Oni ne smogut u neye pokhishchennoye vzyat', - Bespomoshchen i pochitatel' neradivyy, I tot, kogo on neradivo chtit
